text:
@JoeBiden @Kellyanne1977 So if you have stroke or cancer you cant get free treatment but if you get coronavirus you do? At a moral level this is just unfair.

All conditions are a crisis for the person suffering and treatment should be free at the point of use. Medicare4all!
